quote: You should not stand at the crossroads to slaughter his escapees, And you should not hand over his survivors in the day of distress.
But I do not want to do anything without your consent, so that your good deed may be done, not under compulsion, but of your own free will.
However, I am hoping to see you soon, and we will speak face-to-face. May you have peace. The friends send you their greetings. Give my greetings to the friends by name.
Yes, the seventh one in line from Adam, Eʹnoch, also prophesied about them when he said: “Look! Jehovah came with his holy myriads
